name: This flow Runs on the IoT Sandbox
This is the message playground, let's play!
Use Debug nodes to see what kind of data come out of the LinkOuts (the INPUTS)
Then (optionally)modify those messages and pass them along to the named LinkIn nodes (the OUTPUTS)
Also, you can add your own flow and copy any input and output nodes from below into it, and they will work!
Find the devices in the rooms, using the ID number written on it that matches the first part of the input/output names below
eg the device named "motionE8DA" has all the inputs and outputs that start with /motionE8DA
Send Servo to position at number in payload
or make a new tab and copy inputs/outputs you need to there.
MicroBits Device B Button Sender and Display
Rainbow Light display on Device c (1-360)
Send Servo to position at number in payload
Rainbow Light display on Device c (1-360)

This Flow maps OSC messages to named linkOuts and LinkIns, usually of the same name, or could be simplified.
This is so the Messages Swithboard looks clean and easy to play with
OSC Messages come in here, over port 7777
Look in the debug window to see what kind of messages are coming in
